channel.title: New Features & Releases on
channel.description: Recent content in New Features & Releases on

item.title: SeaChat Release History
item.description: 05/02/2024 # New Features # Upload Table Optimization: On the upload table page, users can now choose whether to upload each row in a table file as an individual Knowledge Base document or as a single file. Added Wix Channel: You can now deploy your Agent on Wix. Database Enhancement: Restructured Knowledge Base data for optimized data retrieval and interpretation. Interface Optimization for Shopify and Squarespace Channels: Enhanced user interface for more streamlined operations for these integrations.
